dct_title_s: A map of America: according to ye newest and most exact observations; by Herman Moll, geographer.
dct_description_sm: Vol. III outside upper left margin; "p. 155" outside upper right margin. The state of California is depicted as an island. From Moll's "Forty-two new maps of Asia, Africa, and America" published 1716. 1 map; 27 x 19 cm.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
